explains: v. 居住，栖身；总是想着，唠叨（dwell on）
wordGroup: dwell time 保压时间；停延时间
dwell upon 深思；细想；仔细想

sentences.en: "I'd rather not dwell on the past," he told me.
sentences.cn: “我宁愿不多想过去，”他告诉我。

sentences.en: I shut out the memory which was too painful to dwell on.
sentences.cn: 我不让自己去回忆那段会引起我太多痛苦的往事。

sentences.en: So you made a mistake, but there's no need to dwell on it.
sentences.cn: 你是错了，不过不必老是想着这事儿。
